text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
...As I walk towards the stage...

Inching closer to a dreamlike place...
That's how it feels.
...The stage is like a dream...?
...Yes.

...a place where the ordinary Chiyuki Kuwayama
can become Alstroemeria's Chiyuki Kuwayama...

The time spent heading there
feels somehow precious...
...maybe I'm feeling it more profoundly...

Isn't that nice?
It's like a good luck charm, isn't it?

What Chiyuki values will surely become the
light and water for Chiyuki to bloom, I'm sure.

Oh, isn't that...
A bit too romantic?

Is it?
I thought it was quite... on point...

Well, in that case... I feel more confident now...
...I'll be off, Producer-san.
Chiyuki!

Today too, as Alstroemeria...
Have a blast!
Yes!
As I stand in the midst of a dream...

Please watch over me today too,
Producer-san!
